### Description

R as calculator, setting and cleaning up workspace, how to use R help and where to find support. German course language facilitates first steps with R for german beginners. ### Installation

```r
swirl::install_course("R-Grundlagen")
```

#### Manual Installation

1. Download [this](http://swirlstats.com/scn/R-Grundlagen.swc) file.
2. Run `swirl::install_course()` in the R console.
3. Select the file you just downloaded.
